Articles.Content:
This little car has a short life but fun to launch and fly, I haven't been able to land it and I might do more tweaks later, thought some one may like it.

Note: I've tried to launch from the SPH but no luck on a runway.

Directions:

While on the launch pad hold your flaps down by pressing and holding S key then space bar to launch, sparks, fire, and smoke will fly but keep holding the S key and it will pull out of it, this makes it fun to launch.

Craft File Here

https://files.secureserver.net/0sh5CdmAJ6zkSd

Edited June 2, 2014 by castille7
